entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Refresh ILVerify and file runtime issues as needed #69860
    17.9
  • `Inline temporary variable` fixer on a reference-type `var` regresses nullability #69859
  • `dotnet format` fails with error CS0246: The type or namespace name 'XYZ' could not be found (are you missing a using directive or an assembly reference? #69858

Closed

  • Unexpected CS1573 with XML docs that are already inherited #69126
  • CS0111 error upon rebuild #68895
  • Collection expressions: interface target types should be limited to specific System.Collections.Generic interfaces #69839
  • Parse errors when conditional directives are combined with raw string literals #69776
    17.8
  • Roslyn has introduced many source-built prebuilts #69847
  • Bad top-level program syntax results in assertion in `LexicalSortKey` #67050
    C# 12.0
  • Static fields in interfaces should cause the compiler to emit `beforefieldinit` on the interface #69413
    17.9
  • Diagnostics not refreshed in FSA with editorconfig option changes #69763
  • ExportCodeFixProvider should be marked as Inherited = false #69809
    17.8 P4

PullRequests

Created

  • Reduce work done in operator overload syntax classifier. #69866
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add tasks for running a new vscode instance with a specific language server #69865
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix issue with stale cached data in LSP pull diagnostics #69864
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Bring LSP pull diagnostic range-computation more in line with how our squiggle tagger does things. #69861
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Create a brokered service to delegate loading of projects to us #69857
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: type inference from spread elements #69856
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions

Merged

  • Collection expressions: support builder methods returning derived or implementing types #69770
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Simplify diagnostic squiggling code #69862
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Collection expressions: interface target types should be limited to specific System.Collections.Generic interfaces #69842
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Collection Expressions, Next
  • Properly support (and reject) a limited set of preprocessor directive scenarios for 'use expression body'. #69849
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Randomize analyzer instantiation to avoid static constructor/jit contention #69838
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, Next
  • Fix source build trying to consume StreamJsonRpc #69854
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Ensure location of a "simple program" type refers to a source tree #69845
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Simple Programs, untriaged, Next
  • Emit BeforeFieldInit flag on interfaces #69850
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Default Interface Impl, untriaged, Next
  • Update "Current Document" background analysis semantics and fix Full Solution analysis with project config changes #69750
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Mark export attributes as Inherited = false #69810
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, Next
  • Add support for reading runsettings passed by the client #69792
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Improve generic type argument list error recovery #69734
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Improve GetNextToken / GetPreviousToken perf #69740
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Optimize `T ?? null` to `T` where `T` is a reference type #69803
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: synthesize readonly list type for IEnumerable<T>, IReadOnlyCollection<T>, IReadOnlyList<T> #69802
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions
  • Nullable conversion of collection expressions #69852
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions, 17.8
  • Update the C# syntax generator to use a few more modern C# constructs. #69703
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Handle long extension invocation chains #69831
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.8
  • Compiler support for respecting custom configured analyzer severity settings #69843
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • IDE changes for respecting code style severity from 'option_name = option_value:severity' entries in command line builds #69844
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Handle non-member-overriding context in OverrideCompletion #69855
    Area-IDE, untriaged
